Are you <lb n="c57-0169__main__3"/>mad, my friend,said he, orwhither does your <lb n="c57-0169__main__4"/>senseless curiosity lead you –Wouldyou also <lb n="c57-0169__main__5"/>create for yourself & n="c57-0169__main__7"/>tend.Peace, peace;learn my miseries &<lb n="c57-0169__main__8"/>donot seek to encreaseyour own.<milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb If I <lb n="c57-0172__main__20"/>w <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0172__main__d4e34247">h</del> ereengaged in any high undertaking <lb n="c57-0172__main__21"/>or designfraught with extensive <w ana="start"/>uti<lb n="c57-0172__main__22"/>lity<w ana="end"/> to my fellow creaturesthen could I <lb n="c57-0172__main__23"/>live to fulfil it—Butsuch is not my <lb n="c57-0172__main__24"/>destiny –Imust pursue & destroy the <lb n="c57-0172__main__25"/><mod sID="c57-0172__main__d4e34266"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0172__main__d4e34268">creature</del> <anchor xml:id="c57-0172.01"/><lb n="c57-0172__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c57-0172__left_margin__d4e34277"/>being<sga-add eID="c57-0172__left_margin__d4e34277"/><mod eID="c57-0172__main__d4e34266"/>to whom I gave existencethen <lb n="c57-0172__main__26"/>my taskwill be fulfilled& I may die.
